name: Torpedo Connecticut Shade
additionalNotes:
Don Priamo is a handmade, box pressed cigar which is medium bodied and crafted from a fine selection of Dominican Republic and Nicaraguan tobaccos. It is long filled with Dominican binders and your choice of a Sumatra or Connecticut wrapper for a taste of class!
